import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; function CreatePost() { const initialValues = { title: "", postText: "", username: "" } const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ title: Yup.string().required("Title Required"), postText: Yup.string().required("Post Text Required"), username: Yup.string().min(3).max(15).required("Username Required"), }) const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data) } return (
) } export default CreatePost
